name: Fast Food Chef
description:
Welcome to the culinary world, where the best hotdogs in town are made. Does anyone have doubts?

Fast Food Chef is a sim-cooking game in which you have the role of making the best food in town with the goal of having as many customers as possible and making as much money as possible to expand the restaurant to other countries.

This success will only be possible if you pay attention to every possible detail, namely, to serve the customer correctly, not to make his food burnt, not to confuse the products and so on.
Accuracy, love and devotion... Does it describe you? Then this is the perfect job for you!

Game features :
- Multiple levels
- Restaurant in 4 countries(USA,China,Italy,Australia)
- Achievement table
- Chance to upgrade(Equipment,Decorations,Special)
Note: The game is quite hard right from the start, so in order to be able to pass the beginning levels like 3,4, you have to buy grill & plates upgrade!
